content: the easy cozy crochet sweater is a long sleeved warm sweater that is based on a lace stitch it features a boatneck design that can be customized to be off the shoulder or crocheted as a tighter on the shoulder style there is ribbing on the sleeve cuffs however no ribbing on the base of the sweater giving it a slightly deconstructed look the easy cozy sweater is designed to hit slightly below the waist with an oversized look however it can also be customized easily as a crop or a longer tunic the stitch pattern is simple using primarily double crochets and suitable for those wanting to crochet their first sweater the easy cozy crochet sweater is a free and easy crochet pattern available as a size inclusive made to measure pattern it is beginner friendly and uses weight 4/worsted yarn
